name: Minesweeper 3D (itch) (v0xel)
description:
Is it harder in 3D?

If you can do the game in 2D then also can you do that in 3D? A simple Minesweeper game with the basic logic but in 3D! This game was made in 1 week and created for the JFO Jam III. (Retro Remake).

Controls
  • Left Click - Reveal Tile
  • Right Click - Put a Flag
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • ESC - Pause
  • Smile Click - Restart
Credits / About
  • Game Engine - Unity
  • Programming - v0xel
  • Music - Baracsi Donát
  • 3D Models - Falsenamen
  • Sprites/Textures - From the Original Minesweeper
